price: 25. Nabii Muusa isi Rabbi kallacak Yi-Rabbow diggah anu inni Nafsii kee inni toobokoyta Nabii Haaruun nafsik-sa duudam mayyuk nee kee Ni-maray ku-amri cineeh ku- taaqatak yewqê fan baxisaay nee mekel iyye.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ إِلَّا نَفۡسِي وَأَخِيۖ فَٱفۡرُقۡ بَيۡنَنَا وَبَيۡنَ ٱلۡقَوۡمِ ٱلۡفَٰسِقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī lā amliku illā nafsī wa-akhī fa-uf'ruq baynanā wabayna al-qawmi al-fāsiqīna
